archimate:Capability.name: Autentisering av web-steder
archimate:Capability.documentation:
Trusted information on a website (e.g. a certificate) which allows users to verify the authenticity of the website and its link to the entity/person owning the website.
Relevant ifm. API-kall.

properties.value: Trusted information on a website (e.g. a certificate) which allows users to verify the authenticity of the website and its link to the entity/person owning the website
